November 2018 Certified Ethical Hacker CEH April 2017 to Present A Certified Ethical Hacker is a skilled professional who understands and knows how to look for weaknesses and vulnerabilities in target systems and uses the same knowledge and tools as a malicious hacker but in a lawful and legitimate manner to assess the security posture of a target systems The CEH credential certifies individuals in
